In Game number 1 i was being grieved by a trolling bot lane who intentionally tried to get me to flame. They to leash me at lvl 1 jg, then they intentionally fed bot lane for the fun of it, then they start typing in all chat that i should be banked for refusing to gank them which inadvertently lead to me flamming and getting quite upset. Bot lane then preceeded to follow me around and take my jg camps whenever i didnt have smite, making the game 3 v 5 with bot lane trolling. How come people like that are not punished and i am for calling them "%%%%s" or telling them to "fuck off" because they are following me around everywhere?

In Game number 3, i was playing with mates and flamming at them just as a joke, we do it all the time. However other people on the team decided to report me because they didnt understand the context of my flamming as being a joke with people ive known for 6 or more years.  You can clearly tell im talking to my mates in the first few likes where i am specifically naming some of my friends names to 2 other mates in game because they asked me where he went. Why should i get banned for having a joke with my mates?

Game number 2 is the only bannable thing out of these 3 texts. Yes what i said was extremely offensive to any asian people and to others even witnessing that stuff. I agree it was completely wrong and i do ask for a forgiveness, i have learnt from my lessons and i understand that i shouldnt say anything of those sorts. I shouldnt even say the word fuck to be honest in the chat as it does seem to be offensive to some league of legends players and the community. I will do anything just to get my account back and i mean anything, if it means one last chance and im perma banned then im fine with that, if it means doing some community work ill do that too, please help :(. Im really sorry.

Thank you for spending your time reading this. If there is anything you can do please help :).

replies.body:
Sorry, your attitude is toxic to the point of creating an extremely negative experience for everyone on your team purely because of how you felt towards others. Game 1; no issues with the ban Game 2; game 2... no comment needed. Game 3; On your next account, perhaps let people now "These are my friends, its how we get along" 

Learn your lesson, remake. Realise that maturity and reason is the answer, not returning toxic attitude. Be above it, not under it. Regardless of others triggering your anger or not. It's up to you with how you respond. And you responded with racism, language i assume is like c**t not many four letter words in australia that offends anyone. So i guess it's that. We're in Oce, fuck isn't a swear word here. But considering that it is open to all ages, you are expected not to use excessive profanity just to emphasize a point. 

You've brought it on yourself. I hope the lesson is learnt and when you make a new account, you won't continue this sort of behavior. Initiated by others or not. In saying that, it is up to you to also report people whom are unsportsmanlike and toxic. 


The most toxic thing in this community is people do not accept responsibility for their actions... Quick to claim any glory, fast to deny wrong doing. 

You have to be in a position that is above that to feel you have any credible reason to complain. You haven't, you're both in the wrong, but mostly from the games shown and text shown. Your own actions regardless have earned you the punishment.

> Game one
**TL;DR**
* Didn't help team
>* Blamed/trashtalked your laners

Actually,[ not helping your team IS reportable behaviour](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q4). 
Calling your teammates intentional feeders and trolls is not seeing a positive atmosphere. Even if they are trying to get you to flame, be the bigger person and mute them. Do not criticise their plays, just stay silent and continue playing to the best of your ability. 

>Game two
**TL;DR**
_ontheleg: just wondering mf
ontheleg: are you an illegal immigrant?
ontheleg: go back to china you fucking aids %%%%
ontheleg: stop fucking with the australian economy
ontheleg: getting your rich ass chinese parents to build you a future
ontheleg: an illegal toxic immigrant
>ontheleg: who afks_

* Targeted abuse, racism and hate speech. This kind of behaviour is considered most toxic, and can lead to you skipping punishment tiers and ending up where you are. No matter what your team is doing, you should never ever come back with words like this. 

>Game three
TL;DR
ontheleg: shut the fuck up and neck yourself you rat
ontheleg: i wasnt asking for your input you little fucker
ontheleg: HAHAHAH 12 year old %%%%
>ontheleg: you sound like you have down syndrome zed

* YOU TOLD SOMEONE TO KILL THEMSELVES. You likened someone's life to an insult. If you aren't playing in a full premade, you should't be saying this kind of stuff in chat. It is incredibly toxic and players not in on the joke will report you for it. If you want to have some toxic banter, try a voice chat such as Discord, Curse Voice, Teamspeak or Skype. 

Typically, you move up punishments in tiers,

* 10 game chat restriction
* 25 game chat restriction
* 14 day suspension
* Permaban

If your behaviour is deemed incredibly toxic (death threats, racism, sexism, homophobia, telling people to kill themselves), it is possible to jump up the ladder a bit.  Which is what it looks like happened to you. 

If you believe the ban was in error, you can send in a support ticket to appeal your case (**your ban was fully justified so that will not get you your account back**). Due to the nature of your chat logs, it looks like you are stuck with your ban and nothing (not even IRL community service) can get it back for you.
FYI the person i told to " neck themselves" was my mate and he says the same shit to me if i make stupid plays etc.
Ye, but if you aren't full premade, best to stay away from that kind of toxicity or stick to voice chat where the random can't hear you.

If someone intentionally tries to get you to flame, and you realise it, why the hell would you give in an start being toxic? You're pretty much letting them win, and they'll keep doing it because they know it's working.

and judging by what you said in all 3 games, you deserve the ban you got

Hey Summoner

I'll save you some time and say that there is no hope of getting your account unbanned.

_**It might be useful to understand though, why you were banned in some cases.**_

+ **Game 1** 
_ontheleg: not ganking you kindred
ontheleg: could have helped you but fuck you
ontheleg: fuck you off
ontheleg: dont help them azir
ontheleg: dont help that %%%% kindred
ontheleg: i dont care
ontheleg: kindred put me so behind_

 I understand that these people were possibly trolling and set you off, but you cannot reply to someone like this. When you harass someone with offensive language, you become just as bad as them and will receive similar punishment.

 Instead you need to report them with the post-game report system, and mute whoever you can in-game. I know it sucks when this happens, but replying like you did only makes it worse.

 This game falls under report categories [explicit language](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q2) and [not focusing on a team aspect of the game.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752884-Reporting-a-Player#h1q4)

+ **Game 3**
_ontheleg: this is aids
ontheleg: this is fucking aids
ontheleg: shut the fuck up and neck yourself you rat
ontheleg: i wasnt asking for your input you little fucker
ontheleg: HAHAHAH 12 year old %%%%
ontheleg: you sound like you have down syndrome zed_

 I understand that this was just an inside joke with some friends, but you need to be extremely careful when there's a stranger on your team. The stranger might not understand the context, and to him you guys are just toxic. Please only joke around like this when it's a full 5 man premade team.

 If you want to learn more, you can find **Riot Lyte** talking about this [here](https://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answers/133489071298). 

 _**Otherwise just follow the general rule:**_

>  _Would you say something like this in a public situation with strangers nearby? _
> **If the answer is no, then don't use it in League**.

+ I won't elaborate on why **Game 3** and **Game 2** were offensive, since you already seem to understand. 

It's a shame that you were banned like this. You seem like a good guy who just didn't understand that you need to be accountable for your actions online as well.

I hope this cleared up any misunderstandings.

Firstly, there's been no admin posts in this thread, there have been posts by emmisaries though (so I'm just going to assume that's what you meant).

Secondly, none of the emmisaries ever said that you weren't toxic in game one, they simply pointed out that you were refusing to co-operate and that doing so is a punishable offence (within reason).

Thirdly, as pointed out by Princess Yaia, you turned suicide into a joke. It doesn't matter that the comment in question was directed at one of your friends, it's not acceptable behaviour in the situation you used it in. If you were in a premade of five with four of your friends, fair enough let it slide *but* that's not the case.

Lastly, all I've done in my comment is state how easy it was for myself to indentify the toxicity in the chat logs provided and understand why that would result in the punishment you received. The fact that you seem to be seeking reform (even if it is too late for this account) is a good sign, and hopefully you won't be punished again.
